W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After evading the attack of a mysterious assailant, you awaken in an unfamiliar place. Supposedly it is a world to which dead warriors are summoned.

W17_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_SCAN_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You now have the ability to scan future possibilities.

W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_000_DETAIL.text: You have been assigned to a band of warriors called the Generalsâ€”but what is the purpose behind such a group to begin with?

W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_RUIN_000_DETAIL.text: The first phase of General's operation is to seize the ruins and attract the enemy's attention.

W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLE_000_DETAIL.text: It's time to head for the temple. The Guvs will protect the ruins in your stead.

W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_HOLE_000_DETAIL.text: The time has come to march on the Cleft of Chaos, the source of all Brighthome's woes.

W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_010_DETAIL.text: The operation was going so well. How did it end in failure?

W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_CASTLE_000_DETAIL.text: It's time to bid farewell to this world of endless conflict.

W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W17_EVAR_SIUG_EINHERJAR_100_DETAIL.text: You have been assigned to a group of warriors called the Generals. What fate awaits you as part of this band?
